TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Samuel M Williams, 11-05-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, November 5, 1833. Law of April 6, 1830, amended. Santa Anna favorable to Texas. Quarrel with Farias. Danger that Texas will be organized as a territory. Willingness to sacrifice self for Texas.

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Samuel M. Williams, Mexico, November 5, 1833. Law of April 6, 1830, amended. Santa Anna favorable to Texas. Quarrel with Farias. Danger that Texas will be organized as a territory. Willingness to sacrifice self for Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[From Williams Papers, Rosenberg Library, Galveston, Tex.]*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-05-1833">Novr. 5—-1833*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir.*/p*
*p*A number of cases occurred here during the Cholera of persons who died, were taken to the grave and then came to life again—one *person_mentioned*man*/person_mentioned*, rolled up in a blanket was thrown into a pit with many others, lime was first spread over them. It operated on this man so as to stimulate him to life again—he got up and walked home. His appearance there could not have caused a more sudden and agreable surprise, than the sight of your letter of *date_mentioned n="09-17-1833">17 sept*/date_mentioned*, did to me. *person_mentioned*Col B. [Butler]*/person_mentioned* recd letters from *person_mentioned*C. [Coles?]*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*W. [Whiteside]*/person_mentioned* stating in the positive that you and *person_mentioned*Cap Martin*/person_mentioned* were dead.*person_mentioned* Doctor Rivers */person_mentioned*wrote the same from *location_mentioned*Monclova */location_mentioned*so that I had no doubt of it. I really congratulate you and *person_mentioned*Sarah */person_mentioned*that they were mistaken.*/p*
*p*The law repealing the 11 article of *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">6 april 1830*/date_mentioned* passed both houses ten days since, and I understand has been approved by the *person_mentioned*president*/person_mentioned* but it is not published yet—presume it will be in two or three days.*/p*
*p*I think that all the *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*matters will be satisfactorily arranged in a short time. I shall remain here as long as anything is undone,-— if there is a prospect of doing any good by it. I think something will be effected in the mail and *location_mentioned*customhouse */location_mentioned*arrangements. It is said that *person_mentioned*Zavala */person_mentioned*is to be *person_mentioned*minister of State*/person_mentioned*, and some speak of *person_mentioned*Genl Mejia*/person_mentioned* for the *location_mentioned*war department*/location_mentioned*, I believe there will be a change of *person_mentioned*ministers */person_mentioned*in a few days.*/p*
*p*I have had two interviews with the *person_mentioned*President Santana*/person_mentioned*. He speaks very friendly about *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. I am of opinion that if you all keep quiet and obey the state laws that the substance of all Texas wants will be granted. The appearance of things is much better than it was a *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1833">month */date_mentioned*or even two weeks ago.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Bustamante*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Arista */person_mentioned*and a large number of the *person_mentioned*banished*/person_mentioned*, about 300 left here a few days since for *location_mentioned*vera cruz*/location_mentioned* to embark—they were banished for life*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*Congress */person_mentioned*have repealed all laws that gave power to *person_mentioned*judges */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*civil authority*/person_mentioned* to enforce the collection of diezmos, or to compel *person_mentioned*nuns*/person_mentioned* or *person_mentioned*monkes */person_mentioned*to remain in *location_mentioned*convents */location_mentioned*contrary to their will—so that it is now a mere matter of conscience to pay tythes or stay in a convent, several *person_mentioned*nuns */person_mentioned*are out already— the whole system as it existed is undergoing a change desean tumbar lo gótico, y fabricar conforme a lo moderno.*/p*
*p*No *location_mentioned*11 league grants*/location_mentioned* can be had now for any price within reason— not one.*/p*
*p*I wish you to reflect on the awkward situation your affairs as well as mine would have been left, if you had actually died—and try and close them all so as to run no more risks for the future. *person_mentioned*Luke */person_mentioned*writes that all will be content with sending the State question to the *location_mentioned*States*/location_mentioned*. This remark of his displays more common sense than was in the fashion when I left. I got a letter from *person_mentioned*Coles */person_mentioned*the *date_mentioned n="11-30-1833">last of September */date_mentioned*of an opposite character which had a very bad effect. It has taken almost ever since to remedy the evils proclaimed by it. what I mean to say is that it irritated me and I acted under that influence—but all is smooth again.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Dn Victor Blanco*/person_mentioned* is a good *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned*—he rejoices much that you are not a ghost, and wishes you to be very attentive to finish all the titles for which you are agent which I hope you will do and write to him.*/p*
*p*I doubt whether I shall return now I will stay as long as anything is to be done for the good of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*. The sacrifice *person_mentioned*Luke */person_mentioned*speaks of (as a main thing) is with me a secondary affair. I would sacri- fice my property and life to serve *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*and the substantial *location_mentioned*settlers*/location_mentioned*, the *location_mentioned*farmers */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*working men*/location_mentioned*—but I would not willingly do that much for men who would cut me, if they could. I have drawn on *location_mentioned*N. O */location_mentioned*(*person_mentioned*Beers*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*St John*/person_mentioned* and co) for one thousand dollars on the letters of credit you sent me. I think I shall not need any more.*/p*
*p*Get the titles from *person_mentioned*Padilla */person_mentioned*(3 leagues) and make the transfers of the *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Aguirrie */person_mentioned*tract */location_mentioned*for as they now stand your death would loose them, as you will see by examining the subject. The *location_mentioned*tract that *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*surveyed east of colorado*/location_mentioned* I wish to keep and will not part from at present. Also close the *person_mentioned*Cole */person_mentioned*business and in fact all other matters and be ready for anything that may happen.*/p*
*p*My present opinion is that all will result fortunately (that is if you all keep quiet at home) but in these ticklish times, almost every day brings in unexpected change of some kind.*/p*
*p*I fear much difficulty about the *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*from one quarter, and I have just been told that an effort would be made from that source to make it a *location_mentioned*territory */location_mentioned*under the plan of the *location_mentioned*territories in the U. S.*/location_mentioned* I replyed that I should protest against it, and told the *person_mentioned*President */person_mentioned*so or rather showed him my instructions on that point—besides this, there is no constitutional power in *person_mentioned*congress */person_mentioned*to make it a *location_mentioned*territory*/location_mentioned*. To be more plain I am just now informed that *person_mentioned*Za. [Zavala]*/person_mentioned* is in favor of a *location_mentioned*territory */location_mentioned*tho he told me the reverse not two days since. I told him I should protest against it. Since then he has not said anything to me about it.*/p*
*p*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/p*
*/div1*
